text: Galsworthy is a surname. People with the surname include: * Arthur Galsworthy (1916–1986), British soldier and diplomat * Anthony Galsworthy (born 1944), British diplomat * John Galsworthy (1867–1933), English novelist and playwright * John Galsworthy (diplomat) (1919–1992), British diplomat * Marilyn Galsworthy (born 1954), British actress * Mike Galsworthy (fl. 2003–2019), British media commentator * Robert Galsworthy (born 1989), Australian weightlifter
title: Galsworthy (surname)
